about_the_game:
Unlock more customization options for Block Heads: Instakill. Featuring new skins, sounds, guns, and kill styles! With a focus on the world ending aspect of everyday life.

  • 18 NEW Skins, some with variations, including: A Biohazard Skin, A Pyro, An Apocalypse Doctor, Prisoner Survivor.
  • 1 NEW Hat with 4 variations: Gotta keep that noggin safe.
  • 1 NEW Outfit with 2 variations: A gas mask that not only filters but pierces your enemies to their very core with fear.
  • 2 NEW Guns: The perfect way to let someone else know that it's your water.
  • 2 NEW Gun Sounds: Make sure to wear ear protection.
  • 1 NEW Kill Style: Dissolve your enemies into a pile of nothing!
detailed_description:
Unlock more customization options for Block Heads: Instakill. Featuring new skins, sounds, guns, and kill styles! With a focus on the world ending aspect of everyday life.

  • 18 NEW Skins, some with variations, including: A Biohazard Skin, A Pyro, An Apocalypse Doctor, Prisoner Survivor.
  • 1 NEW Hat with 4 variations: Gotta keep that noggin safe.
  • 1 NEW Outfit with 2 variations: A gas mask that not only filters but pierces your enemies to their very core with fear.
  • 2 NEW Guns: The perfect way to let someone else know that it's your water.
  • 2 NEW Gun Sounds: Make sure to wear ear protection.
  • 1 NEW Kill Style: Dissolve your enemies into a pile of nothing!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Intel Core2Quad Q6600 2.40 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-4440 3.10 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
